profile.title: Profile
profile.updatedMessage: Your profile has been updated successfully

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.updatedMessage: Your connectivity settings have been updated successfully
connectivity.storeOnServer: Store on server (to use on other devices)
connectivity.awsHowTo: How to get AWS Bedrock credentials:
connectivity.awsStep1: 1. Sign up for an AWS account at aws.amazon.com
connectivity.awsStep3: 3. Create a new IAM user or use existing one
connectivity.awsStep6: 6. Copy the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key
connectivity.awsStep7: 7. Make sure to enable the models you need in the AWS Bedrock Console
connectivity.awsProfile: AWS profile (useful on local dev env)
connectivity.openaiHowTo: How to get OpenAI API keys:
connectivity.openaiStep2: 2. Sign up or log in to your account
connectivity.openaiStep5: 5. Copy the key immediately (it won't be shown again)
connectivity.openaiStep6: 6. Add billing information to enable API usage
connectivity.yandexHowTo: How to get Yandex Cloud credentials:
connectivity.yandexStep3: 3. Create a service account with ai.languageModels.user role
connectivity.yandexStep4: 4. Create an API key for the service account
connectivity.yandexStep6: 6. Note your folder ID from the cloud console
connectivity.s3Connected: S3 storage is connected on backend and ready to use. You can add your own S3 credentials below if needed.

settings.title: Settings
settings.aiUpdatedMessage: Your AI settings have been updated successfully

password.changedMessage: Your password has been changed successfully
password.mismatchMessage: New password and confirmation do not match

errors.networkError: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again later.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

home.subtitle: A universal chat interface for AI models

chat.messagesLimitReached: You have reached the limit of {{limit}} messages in this chat
chat.ragNotEnabled: RAG is not enabled. Documents will not be processed.
chat.s3NotEnabled: S3 connection is not enabled. You cannot upload/generate images.
chat.ragNotConfigured: RAG is supported but processing models are not yet configured. Document uploads are not possible. To enable this feature, please select the appropriate processing models.
chat.noRequestId: No request ID found for current message
chat.systemPromptTooltip: The initial prompt that sets the behavior of the AI assistant in this chat.
chat.temperatureTooltip: Controls randomness: lower values make responses more focused and deterministic, higher values make responses more creative and varied.
chat.topPTooltip: Controls diversity: lower values filter out unlikely options, higher values preserve more possibilities.
chat.maxTokensTooltip: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A token is about 4 characters or 0.75 words.
chat.deleteMessagePrompt: What would you like to delete?
chat.messageEditedMessage: Message has been edited and following messages regenerated
chat.editMessageWarning: Editing this message will regenerate all following AI responses in the conversation.
chat.deleteChatMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action cannot be undone.
chat.startNewConversation: Start a new conversation with an AI model by clicking the New Chat button.
chat.configureProvider: Please configure at least one provider on the settings page
chat.thenFetchModels: Then fetch models on the models page
chat.afterThatCreateChat: After that, you can create a new chat
chat.failedToCheckChats: Failed to check for existing chats
chat.configureModels: Please configure AI models before creating a chat

documents.title: Documents
documents.filesTooLarge: Some files are too large and were not added (max size: {{maxSize}} MB)
documents.nonImageFilesOnly: You can upload only non-image files here
documents.failedToAddToChat: Failed to add document to chat
documents.failedToRemoveFromChat: Failed to remove document from chat
documents.failedToLoadRetry: Failed to load documents. Please try again.
documents.deleteDocumentMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{fileName}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove the document and all its associated data.
documents.reindexDocumentMessage: Are you sure you want to reindex "{{fileName}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove all the document embeddings and summary.
documents.attachDocuments: Attach/select documents to do RAG search

models.enterTestPrompt: Enter text to test the model
models.noCostInfo: No cost information available for the selected period.
models.selectDateRange: Select a date range and click Refresh to view cost information.
models.deleteCustomModelMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the custom model "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
models.noModels: No AI models available. Please contact your administrator.
models.noModelsFiltered: No models match your filter criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
models.modelIdDescription: Unique identifier for this model in your system
models.modelNameApiDescription: The model identifier to send to the API
models.maxInputTokensDescription: Maximum number of input tokens the model can handle
models.endpointApiKeyRequired: Endpoint, API Key and Model Name (API) are required for testing
models.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
models.noActiveProvidersMessage: No active AI providers connected. Please configure at least one provider on the connectivity page.

models.yandexRequiresEnv: Yandex requires an API key. Set the following environment variable:
models.yandexRequiresSetup: Yandex requires an API key. Please setup connection credentials on connectivity page.

admin.title: Administration
admin.adminRequiredMessage: {{message}}. You need admin privileges to access this page.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.deleteMcpServerMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
mcp.mcpDescription: Register external MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers to extend AI capabilities with custom tools.
mcp.noServersSubtitle: Add an MCP server to extend AI with custom tools
mcp.transportTypeDescription: Use Legacy for servers that use the older SSE protocol
mcp.oauthInfo: Configure OAuth 2.0 authentication. Enable "Requires User Auth" if each user needs to authorize separately.
mcp.authRequiredMessage: This MCP server requires authentication before you can view or test its tools.
mcp.noToolsAvailable: No tools available from this server
mcp.apiKeyDescription: This MCP server requires an API key for authentication. Enter your API key below.
mcp.bearerTokenDescription: This MCP server requires a Bearer token for authentication. Enter your token below.

aiSettings.defaultModelDescription: This model will be used by default for new chats

aiSettings.embeddingsModelDescription: Model used to generate vector embeddings for document chunks
aiSettings.summarizationModelDescription: Model used to generate document summaries (up to 1024 words)
